chinese: 植物能够在它们的一生中持续生长。
english: Plants are able to continue growing throughout their lives.

chinese: 你必须在星期五中午之前交上你的论文。
english: You must hand in your essays by midday on Friday.

chinese: 重力是吸引两个物体相互靠近的力量。
english: Gravity is the force that attracts two bodies toward one another.

chinese: 城堡的设计旨在吓阻当地人和敌人。
english: Castle was designed to intimidate both local people and the enemies.

chinese: 股市崩溃并在全球范围内产生影响。
english: The stock market cracked and had repercussions throughout the world.

chinese: 新闻要到下周才能收到。
english: The news is not received until the following week.

chinese: 专员将资金分配给所有当局。
english: The commissioner will apportion the funds among all the authorities.

chinese: 一系列观察在教室里进行。
english: A series of observations were carried out in the classroom.
